name: docNxgres
description: simple application server, part of a three-container working template back end using Docker Compose and including an Nginx reverse proxy server & PostgreSQL database

scripts.compose:rm:cv: docker-compose down && docker volume rm docnxgres_app-db-data
scripts.compose:rm:civ: docker-compose down && docker rmi docnxgres_server && docker volume rm docnxgres_app-db-data
scripts.compose:ls: docker ps -a && docker images && docker volume ls
scripts.test:down: docker-compose down && docker volume rm docnxgres_test-db-data
